languages.text: За ересь, заключенную в тассерции, породивший его мир был приговорен к священному экстерминатусу. Когда орбитальные орудия флота-палача обрушили всю мощь на планету, ее ядро налилось синим огнем и предсмертной вспышкой выжгло разумы всех, кто наблюдал за уничтожением. Такова была месть Тассеры тем, кто осмелился вершить ее судьбу.

For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.
languages.original_text: За ересь, заключенную в тассерции, породивший его мир был приговорен к священному экстерминатусу. Такова была месть Тассеры тем, кто осмелился вершить ее судьбу.

traits.locale_text: For the heresy that thassertium was a vessel of, its world of origin was condemned to a Holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power on the planet, a blue fire filled its core which then, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who were observing its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who dared decide its fate.

Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who dared decide its fate.

For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.

languages.text: Aufgrund der im Thassertium enthaltenen Ketzerei wurde dessen Herkunftswelt dem heiligen Exterminatus überantwortet. Als die Orbitalkanonen der Hinrichtungsflotte ihre volle Kraft gegen den Planeten entfesselten, erfüllte dessen Kern ein blaues Feuer, das in seinem letzten Aufblitzen den Verstand aller tilgte, die der Zerstörung beigewohnt hatten. Das war Thasseras Rache an allen, die es gewagt hatten, über ihr Schicksal zu richten.
languages.original_text: For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.

traits.locale_text: Aufgrund der im Thassertium enthaltenen Ketzerei wurde dessen Herkunftswelt dem heiligen Exterminatus überantwortet. Als die Orbitalkanonen der Hinrichtungsflotte ihre volle Kraft gegen den Planeten entfesselten, erfüllte dessen Kern ein blaues Feuer, das in seinem letzten Aufblitzen den Verstand aller tilgte, die der Zerstörung beigewohnt hatten. Das war Thasseras Rache an allen, die es gewagt hatten, über ihr Schicksal zu richten.

languages.text: En raison de l'hérésie contenue dans le thassertium, son monde d'origine fut condamné au saint Exterminatus. Lorsque les canons orbitaux de la flotte déchaînèrent toute leur puissance sur la planète, un feu bleu s'infiltra jusqu'en son cœur qui, dans un râle d'agonie, consuma l'esprit de tous ceux qui assistaient à sa destruction. Telle fut la vengeance de Thassera sur ceux qui avaient osé la condamner.
languages.original_text: For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.

traits.locale_text: En raison de l'hérésie contenue dans le thassertium, son monde d'origine fut condamné au saint Exterminatus. Lorsque les canons orbitaux de la flotte déchaînèrent toute leur puissance sur la planète, un feu bleu s'infiltra jusqu'en son cœur qui, dans un râle d'agonie, consuma l'esprit de tous ceux qui assistaient à sa destruction. Telle fut la vengeance de Thassera sur ceux qui avaient osé la condamner.

languages.text: 由于塔瑟拉水晶蕴含的异端力量，它的起源世界也被签发了神圣灭绝令。当舰队的轨道炮将恐怖的炮火倾泻在这颗行星上时，行星的核心熊熊燃烧，迸发出冲天的蓝色烈焰。所有目睹这场毁灭的人都看到了塔瑟拉垂死的闪光，他们的意识也遭到了烧灼。对那些擅自决定塔瑟拉命运的人而言，这便是塔瑟拉的报复。
languages.original_text: For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.

traits.locale_text: 由于塔瑟拉水晶蕴含的异端力量，它的起源世界也被签发了神圣灭绝令。当舰队的轨道炮将恐怖的炮火倾泻在这颗行星上时，行星的核心熊熊燃烧，迸发出冲天的蓝色烈焰。所有目睹这场毁灭的人都看到了塔瑟拉垂死的闪光，他们的意识也遭到了烧灼。对那些擅自决定塔瑟拉命运的人而言，这便是塔瑟拉的报复。
由于塔瑟拉水晶引发的异端恶行，它的起源世界也被签发了神圣灭绝令。当行星舰队的轨道炮将恐怖的炮火倾泻在这颗行星上时，行星的核心熊熊燃烧，迸发出冲天的蓝色烈焰。所有目睹这场毁灭的人都看到了塔瑟拉垂死的闪光，他们的意识也遭到了烧灼。对那些擅自决定塔瑟拉命运的人而言，这便是塔瑟拉的报复。

languages.text: Por la herejía contenida en el thassertio, su mundo de origen fue condenado al sagrado Exterminatus. Cuando los cañones orbitales de la flota de ejecución liberaron todo su poder contra el planeta, un fuego azul llenó su núcleo, que, en un último resplandor, calcinó las mentes de todos los testigos de su destrucción. Tal fue la venganza de Thassera contra quienes habían osado dictar su destino.
languages.original_text: For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.

traits.locale_text: Por la herejía contenida en el thassertio, su mundo de origen fue condenado al sagrado Exterminatus. Cuando los cañones orbitales de la flota de ejecución liberaron todo su poder contra el planeta, un fuego azul llenó su núcleo, que, en un último resplandor, calcinó las mentes de todos los testigos de su destrucción. Tal fue la venganza de Thassera contra quienes habían osado dictar su destino.

languages.text: タッセリウムに絡む異端行為が発覚したため、その産出惑星は聖なる〈究極浄化〉に処された。処刑艦隊の軌道キャノンが惑星に全火力を解き放つと、惑星の核は青い炎に包まれ、その最後の閃光は破壊を見守るすべての者の心を焼き尽くした。これが、タッセーラの運命を決めた者たちへのこの惑星の復讐だった。
languages.original_text: For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.

traits.locale_text: タッセリウムに絡む異端行為が発覚したため、その産出惑星は聖なる〈究極浄化〉に処された。処刑艦隊の軌道キャノンが惑星に全火力を解き放つと、惑星の核は青い炎に包まれ、その最後の閃光は破壊を見守るすべての者の心を焼き尽くした。これが、タッセーラの運命を決めた者たちへのこの惑星の復讐だった。

languages.text: Barındırdığı sapkınlık yüzünden tasertiyum, menşe dünyasıyla birlikte kutsal Eksterminatus'a mahkûm edildi. İnfaz filosunun yörünge topları, gezegenin üzerine tüm gücünü kustuğunda çekirdeği mavi bir ateşle kaplandı ve bu ateş, yok oluşunun habercisi olan son bir parlamayla birlikte yıkımına şahit olan herkesin zihinlerini alazladı. Bu şekilde Thassera, kaderi hakkında söz sahibi olmaya cüret edenlerden intikamını almış oldu.
languages.original_text: For the heresy contained within thassertium, its world of origin was condemned to the holy Exterminatus. When the execution fleet's orbital cannons unleashed their full power upon the planet, a blue fire filled its core, which, in its dying flash, scorched the minds of all who observed its destruction. Such was Thassera's vengeance on those who had dared decide its fate.
